acts.title: Act 1 — Unexpected Knock
steps: A surprise visitor arrives during your parenting time.
They ask to speak with your child briefly.
Decide: allow a short supervised chat, ask them to come later, or refuse.

acts.title: Act 2 — Boundaries
steps: The visitor insists it’s urgent and pressures you.
Balance safety, legal boundaries, and the child’s curiosity.
Choose a boundary statement, call the other parent, or end the interaction.

acts.title: Act 3 — Aftercare
steps: You check in with your child to process feelings.
Consider documenting the event for the parenting log.
Plan how to prevent surprise visits in the future.
